column4: didn't anyone else have trouble with their Fn key not working?

on my laptops. yes. they all have worked. (on the 4 ive had over the last few years)

smart~ The Fn Key is working with the screen brightness F7 and F8 keys
or holding the paper up the the monitor tryign to 'scan' it.
was that a bot (ubottu) that automatically put the pastebin info out?
yes.
what is the easy way to pastebin right from the terminal? I didn't understand how you would indicate which command lines to paste.
use the 'pastebinit' command.
pastebinit foobar.c
i doubt if you can

i recall they get mounted soem where - check mount command and see whats in /media/
i am not seeing host or media anywhere
